member.name: T:MovementSpeedAPI.ISpeedModifier
member.summary: A movement speed modifier object. Player movement speed is affected by its Mod when Active.

member.name: P:MovementSpeedAPI.ISpeedModifier.Mod
member.value: Updates player speed when modified if Active.

member.name: P:MovementSpeedAPI.ISpeedModifier.Active
member.summary: Whether the modifier is active (in the system).

member.name: M:MovementSpeedAPI.ISpeedModifier.Enable
member.summary: Enables the movement modifier (adds it back to the system).

member.name: M:MovementSpeedAPI.ISpeedModifier.Enable(System.Single)
member.summary: Enables the movement modifier (adds it back to the system) and sets its value.

member.name: M:MovementSpeedAPI.ISpeedModifier.Disable
member.summary: Disables this movement modifier (removes it from the system).

member.name: M:MovementSpeedAPI.MoveSpeedAPI.AddModifier(System.Single,MovementSpeedAPI.StackLayer,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a local movement modifier, returning the modifier object.
member.param: The layer within the group to place the modifier on.
The group to put the modifier in. Layers function per-group. Separate groups are multiplied together for the final result.

member.name: T:MovementSpeedAPI.StackLayer
member.summary: Used to determine how speed modifiers stack.

member.name: F:MovementSpeedAPI.StackLayer.Max
member.summary: Only the modifier with the highest value is used.

member.name: F:MovementSpeedAPI.StackLayer.Min
member.summary: Only the modifier with the lowest value is used.

member.name: F:MovementSpeedAPI.StackLayer.Override
member.summary: Overrides all other modifiers. If multiple overrides are applied, the chosen modifier is ambiguous.
